name: Cloud
text:
I'm not a hero and I'm not famous.
So I can't keep our promise.

name: Cloud
text: I do what needs to be done.

name: Sephiroth
text:
Out of my way.
I'm going to see my mother.

name: Barret
text:
Where's its $#&*&@ head?
This whole thing's stupid.
Let's keep goin'.

name: Reno
text:
You're too late.
Once I push this button...

name: Cait Sith
text:
Both Gya haha and Kya haha
are up to something.

name: Aeris
text:
I'll see you later!!
We'll be waiting at the 66th Floor Elevator.

name: Flower girl
options: You'd better get out of here

name: Tifa
text:
The only truck in town.
It's been here since we were little kids, right?

I will go North past Mt. Nibel.
If you wish to know...then follow...

name: Jessie
text:
Push the [OK] button in front of a ladder
to grab on to it.
After that, use the [Directional button]
to move up and down.
